entry.title: Properity - Walnut Halves & Pieces - 450g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Prosperity
Type: BAKING
Price: 7.99

Properity - Walnut Halves & Pieces - 450g

Add texture and taste to your popular dishes with these Walnut!

Perfect for your restaurant or bakery's pantry, a quality product at a great value. This versatile ingredient features an endless number of uses, from garnishing salads and string beans to decorating cakes and pastries. Plus, since they're raw, they won't lend any additional salty flavor.

Versatile Culinary Ingredient

They're just the right size for a variety of applications, such as the finishing touch on salads, parfaits, ice cream, fresh fruit, or enhancing the presentation of baked goods. They add crunchy texture and nutty taste to a variety of entrees such as steamed vegetables or crusted fish, without adding any extra salt.

Bulk Supply

Perfect for high volume establishments, this packing keeps your bakery or restaurant well-stocked for the variety of uses. Plus, with an ample amount, it's easy to quickly measure your ingredients or simply grab a spoonful to sprinkle on dishes.
